desc: At DOMA Coffee Roasting Company, our goal is to roast awesome coffee and do awesome things. We're dedicated to the craft and committed to sustainability. Our 20-year coffee journey has connected our passion for environmental causes, art, coffee, and creativity with the people around us.

layout.text: A Tribute to the Wild Energy of Summer
Summer Lovin’ is an artful blend of Rwanda and Peru coffee. Notes of maple syrup, tangerine, and honeysuckle play with a balanced acidity and clean body.
